urls.title: E.U. May Bar American Travelers as It Reopens Borders, Citing Failures on Virus (Published 2020)
urls.description: European Union officials are racing to agree on who can visit the bloc as of July 1 based on how countries of origin are faring with new coronavirus cases. Americans, so far, are excluded, according to draft lists seen by The New York Times.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@realDonaldTrump Donald wouldn't want u to pay attn to this:
"That prospect, which would lump American visitors in w/Russians & Brazilians as unwelcome, is a stinging blow to American prestige in the world & a repudiation of Pres. Trump’s handling of the virus in the U.S."https://t.co/KqBDdyWKrN
